column3: MAY birthday people. The place was pitch black at 5:00. Way to set the mood...for my sister
column5: best friend and daughter. We ordered a lot. The waiter creeped me out. "You wanted the salads BEFORE your entrees?" Um
column7: but we're flexible. Wtf. You want another glass of wine? It's number 2
column9: and so what of it was. Food was good
